cards.rules_text:
Deathtouch
When Antsnatcher enters, target opponent creates a 1/1 red Insect creature token with first strike. 
Whenever an Insect an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target Spider you control.

First strike
When Nemi's Royal Corps enters, create two 1/1 red Insect creature tokens with first strike. 
Whenever Nemi's Royal Corps attacks, Insects you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control.
Create five 1/1 white Insect creature tokens with flying.

Haste
At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target creature you control gains haste until end of turn.
Distribute two -1/-1 counters between up to two target creatures.

Lifelink
Wither [i](This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)[/i]
Whenever Silent Creeper deals combat damage to a player, proliferate.

Flying
[i]Raid[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with an Insect this turn, create a 1/1 white Insect creature token with flying.

Menace
When Alpha Wolfspider enters, each player sacrifices a creature. Put +1/+1 counters on Alpha Wolfspider equal to the total power of the sacrificed creatures.
Each creature you control deals 1 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

When Succulent Juices enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. 
Whenever one or more counters are put on a creature, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

[i]Mystic [i](The first time this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability each turn, you may activate one of its abilities without paying its costs.)[/i]
[/i]Sacrifice Ornata, Master Oracle: Surveil 2.

[i]Mystic [i](The first time this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability each turn, you may activate one of its abilities without paying its costs.)[/i][/i]
Magic Hoarder gets +1/+0 for each noncreature, nonland card in your graveyard.
{U}{U}: Target creature can't block Frogs you control this turn.

Prowess, haste
When Twilight Darter enters, you may exile target noncreature spell that targets with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard. Cast a copy of that card targeting a frog you control without paying its mana cost.

Until end of turn, target creature you control has size 5/5.
Flashback {1}{I}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
